sect2.title: Command explanations
sect2.para: --enable-capplet: This command is only needed if you use GNOME. It allows sawfish to be configured via the control center.

--with-gdk-pixbuf : This command directs sawfish to use gdk-pixbuf for image management instead of imlib. GTK+2 includes gdk-pixbuf in its package, whereas GTK+ requires an additional package called gdk-pixbuf.
--with-audiofile : This command directs sawfish to use libaudiofile for sound manipulation.
--with-esd : This command directs sawfish to use the Enlightened Sound Daemon.
--with-gnome-prefix=/opt/gnome2 : This command directs sawfish to GNOME's directory.
